law.text: The decision of the board shall be subject to review by the Court of Appeals pursuant to Section 111 of the Kentucky Constitution and rules adopted by the Supreme Court. The scope of review by the Court of Appeals shall include all matters subject to review by the board and also errors of law arising before the board and made reviewable by the rules of the Supreme Court for review of decisions of an administrative agency.
law.history: Amended 1987 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 35, effective January 4, 1988. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 276, effective January 2, 1988. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 192, sec. 23. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 1. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4936.
